byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from London.

abstract: Number of senior journalists at developing Pakistani television network Bol resign, led by editor in chief Kamran Khan, due to scandal involving parent company Axact's profiting from sales of fake diplomas.
lead_paragraph: The defections came hours after the interior minister said that a preliminary investigation conducted last week had uncovered evidence against Axact.

headline.main: Pakistani Journalists Resign to Cut Ties to Axact, a Fake Diploma Company
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Journalists Quit Firm Tied to Diploma Company

snippet: The defections came hours after the interior minister said that a preliminary investigation conducted last week had uncovered evidence against Axact.
